title: There is no Perfect Couple - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Adapted to Manhwa   Arranged Marriage   Artists   Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Love Interests   Couple Growth   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Long Separations   Love at First Sight   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: 이다홍
description:
On the day of their wedding anniversary, the husband announced the end of the marriage. “We are getting a divorce.” Yeonhwa, who has been in love with Geonwoo for a long time, went to his company and refused to divorce and got into an accident. 

“Who are you?” Yeonhwa, who wanted to avoid the divorce, pretended to have lost her memory. Suddenly her husband changed? 

“Let's shower together.” “Because we shower together, every time.'

“When did we? What in the world is this guy thinking?' 

Can we, who are imperfect, be the perfect couple?>
